verses.verse: <S%H136>Lord,<s%> you have been our dwelling <S%H4583>place<s%> for <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

Before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were brought <S%H3205>forth,<s%> before you had <S%H2342>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8398>world,<s%> even from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> you are <S%H410>God.<s%>

For a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> are just <S%H3117>like<s%> <S%H865>yesterday<s%> when it is <S%H5674>past,<s%> like a <S%H821>watch<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
You <S%H2229>sweep<s%> them away as they <S%H8142>sleep.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> they <S%H2498>sprout<s%> like new <S%H2682>grass.<s%>
In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H6692>sprouts<s%> and springs <S%H2498>up.<s%> By <S%H6153>evening,<s%> it is <S%H3001>withered<s%> and <S%H4135>dry.<s%>
For we are <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in your <S%H639>anger.<s%> We are <S%H926>troubled<s%> in your <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
You have <S%H7896>set<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> before <S%H5956>you,<s%> our secret sins in the <S%H3974>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For all our <S%H3117>days<s%> have passed <S%H6437>away<s%> in your <S%H5678>wrath.<s%> We <S%H3615>bring<s%> our <S%H8141>years<s%> to an end as a <S%H1899>sigh.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H7657>seventy,<s%> <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8141><s%> or even by reason of <S%H1369>strength<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> yet their <S%H7296>pride<s%> is but <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H205>sorrow,<s%> for it <S%H1468>passes<s%> <S%H2440>quickly,<s%> and we fly <S%H5774>away.<s%>
Who <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H5797>power<s%> of your <S%H639>anger,<s%> your <S%H5678>wrath<s%> according to the fear that is due to <S%H3374>you?<s%>
So <S%H3045>teach<s%> us to <S%H4487>number<s%> our <S%H3117>days,<s%> that we may <S%H935>gain<s%> a <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H7646>Satisfy<s%> us in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> that we may <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> all our <S%H3117>days.<s%>
Make us <S%H8055>glad<s%> for as many <S%H3117>days<s%> as you have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H8141>us,<s%> for as many years as we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Let your <S%H6467>work<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> your <S%H1926>glory<s%> to their <S%H1121>children.<s%>

Let the <S%H5278>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> be on <S%H3559>us;<s%> establish the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> for <S%H3559>us;<s%> yes, establish the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
